mapper.select: select travelIdx, trrsrtNm, rdnmadr, lnmadr, trrsrtIntrcn, placeImg01, placeImg02, placeImg03, placeImg04, region, latitude, longitude from travellistdb
select trrsrtNm, rdnmadr, lnmadr, trrsrtIntrcn, placeImg01, placeImg02, placeImg03, placeImg04, region, latitude, longitude from travellistdb where travelIdx = #{travelIdx}
select trrsrtNm, rdnmadr, lnmadr, trrsrtIntrcn, placeImg01, placeImg02, placeImg03, placeImg04, latitude, longitude from travellistdb where region = #{region} order by rand() limit 1;
